titles.title: Jesus What A Friend For Sinners (Hymn of the C

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah what a Savior Hallelujah what a Friend Saving helping keeping loving He is with me to the end{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus what a friend for sinners Jesus lover of my soul Friends may fail me foes assail me He my Savior makes me whole{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus what a strength in weakness Let me hide myself in Him Tempted tried and sometimes failing He my strength my vict'ry wins{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus what a help in sorrow While the billows o'er me roll Even when my heart is breaking He my comfort helps my soul{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus what a guide and keeper While the tempest still is high Storms about me night o'ertakes me He my pilot hears my cry{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus I do now receive Him More than all in Him I find He hath granted me forgiveness I am His and He is mine{/lang-eng}
